1.1.Title: Hello, World!
1.1.Description:
Task
 - Write a rust function sayHi that print out "Hello, World!"
 - Call the function twice

2.1.Title: Nested Loop
2.1.Description:
Task
 - create a for loop that loop x in range 0 to 2
 - create another for loop that loop y in range 0 to 1
 - Write a python code that will print out sum of x and y in format "x + y = sum"
